title: Contract Safety Output
description: Schema for Contract Safety GPT static review outputs on Solidity contracts

schema_version.description: Schema version for this output contract

verified.description: True when contract source is verified on-chain (e.g., Etherscan)

owner_privileges.description: True if privileged functions can drain, pause, or reconfigure critical parameters

can_mint.description: True when arbitrary mint/burn is possible outside documented tokenomics

upgradable_proxy.description: True if contract uses proxy pattern (UUPS, Beacon, Transparent)

key_findings: UUPS proxy allows logic upgrades by owner multisig
examples.recommendation: Monitor owner multisig composition and upgrade events. Consider timelock for critical changes.
